alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 2:18PM MST until December 14 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts to 12 inches possible over eastern portions of the county. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
